C

Card - Class in aguiaj.cards
Represents the playing cards.
CardHand - Class in aguiaj.cards
Represents card hands, composed of zero or more ordered cards.
CardHand() - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.CardHand
Constructs an empty card hand.
CardHand(Card[]) - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.CardHand
Constructs a card hand using the cards contained in the array cards.
CardHandWidget - Class in aguiaj.cards.view
 
CardHandWidget() - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.view.CardHandWidget
 
CardStack - Class in aguiaj.cards
Represents card stacks, which can be displayed according to different modes: all cards hidden, only the top card visible, all cards shown.
CardStack() - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.CardStack
Constructs an empty card stack.
CardStackWidget - Class in aguiaj.cards.view
 
CardStackWidget() - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.view.CardStackWidget
 
CardWidget - Class in aguiaj.cards.view
 
CardWidget() - Constructor for class aguiaj.cards.view.CardWidget
 
clearSelection() - Method in class aguiaj.cards.CardHand
Unselects every selected card.
contains(Card) - Method in class aguiaj.cards.CardHand
Boolean query to check if a card exists in the card hand.
